update tbl_monitor_definition

v_monitor_name = #{vMonitorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_monitor_field = #{vMonitorField,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: SELECT v_monitor_name AS monitorName, v_monitor_field AS monitorField, find_in_set(i_monitor_type, #{monitorType}) != 0 AS shieldFlag FROM tbl_monitor_definition WHERE protocalVersion = #{protocalVersion} AND eType = #{eType}
SELECT IFNULL(protocalVersion, 'default') AS protocalVersion, IFNULL(eType, 'default') AS eType FROM tbl_device WHERE v_elevator_code = #{elevatorCode} ORDER BY eType DESC LIMIT 1
